CustomField.formula: IF( Latest_Transmitter_Shipped__c ="G5", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150Y000002Zvci","G5", 30,50),"") & " " & IF( Latest_Transmitter_Shipped__c ="G4", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150Y000002Zvcd","G4", 30,50),"") & " " & IF( Latest_Transmitter_Shipped__c ="G6", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151n000002U7gV","G6", 30,50),"")
CustomField.label: Transmitter Generation
